column5: Hey friends!  So I'm moving to Simcoe, ON  in a couple of weeks and have yet to find a cable/internet/phone provider.  Seems like the big companies aren't out there and you have to go with third party providers.  Just wondering if anyone in the area has a recommendation? Shore fishing opportunities always welcome of course!  lol,  but the wife would prefer if I focus on this project first!  Thanks all!
